name: fps-wss-r1-monorepo
description: Multiplayer FPS game with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:all && concurrently "npm run start:frontend:prod" "npm run start:backend:prod"
scripts.tunnel:backend: echo 'Backend uses same tunnel as frontend'
scripts.tunnel:prod: npm run build:all && concurrently "npm run tunnel:frontend:prod" "echo 'Backend uses same tunnel as frontend'"
scripts.tunnel:frontend:prod: cd react && npm run serve & cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:5642
scripts.tunnel:backend:prod: echo 'Backend uses same tunnel as frontend'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.pm2:start:prod: npm run build:all && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production

author: AidanTheBandit
